Changeset.Change: clears the RR when exception raises while bridging.
Added a reset operation.
Fixed the resources place
Fixed bug that caused an exception to be thrown in delete in RRElement even if the delete process was successful
Changed to depended on RRGCubeBridge [1.0.0, 2.0.0].
Generic Resources are correctly updated during the first iteration
Added support for read/write policies and default behavior for all Resource Registry Elements.
Added direct retrieve and persist methods in RegistryProvider to support non datanucleus datastores that wish to expose the write-through policy.
Renamed datastores using more suitable labels.
Added support for plugins and included their execution in the bridging task.
Improved configuration model. A central properties file is now used, which can optionally point to other configuration. Included plugin config to configuration model.
Fixed behavior in InMemory store.
Fixed prefetch cache defect which caused data inaccessibility in some cases.
Fixed data type handling in prefetch cache remove item method
Support for in memory prefetching of element subset for increased query and loading time performance.
Fixed issue in browsable fields of collection operation
Added support for repository provider configuration
Bridging period is now configurable
Increased maximum length of all derby db strings for which a maximum length has not already been defined to 1024.
First Release
